author: bcholmes
msg: Slightly different fix to DAV prefix problem in DOMUtils (classic off-by-one error).  Also:
- update build.xml (I'm not sure if the build machine has JUnit on it, and I don't want to crash it)

author: remm
msg: - Fix a NPE if session was closed if the connection was already closed.
Thanks to Microsoft and their fake HTTP/1.1 support for helping me find

author: remm
msg: - Fix compliance problems : the methods which send an XML body must set
content-type to text/xml (and indicate the charset)

author: remm
msg: - Forgot the add the session port to the host name.

author: remm
msg: - Properly handles the case where a default namespace is defined.
Namespace prefix was incorrectly set to ":".
